learningGoals.title: How AI Produces Text
learningGoals.description: Learn the fundamentals of how AI generates human-like text
learningGoals.hint: Discover how AI models use tokens and probability distributions to generate text. You'll learn why the same prompt can give different results!

learningGoals.title: What is AI?
learningGoals.description: A beginner-friendly introduction to artificial intelligence
learningGoals.hint: Learn the basics of what AI is, how it differs from traditional software, and why it matters today.

learningGoals.title: AI Tools Overview
learningGoals.description: Discover the landscape of AI tools available today
learningGoals.hint: Get an overview of popular AI tools like ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, and understand their strengths.

learningGoals.title: Temperature & Creativity
learningGoals.description: Control how creative or focused AI responses are
learningGoals.hint: Learn how the "temperature" setting affects AI output - from deterministic and focused to creative and unpredictable.

learningGoals.title: Why AI Hallucinates
learningGoals.description: Understand why AI sometimes makes things up
learningGoals.hint: Explore why AI models confidently generate false information and what causes these "hallucinations".

learningGoals.title: Context Window Limits
learningGoals.hint: Learn about the context window - how much text an AI can "remember" during a conversation and why it matters.

learningGoals.title: Choosing the Right AI
learningGoals.description: Pick the best AI tool for your task
learningGoals.hint: Learn how to evaluate and choose between different AI tools based on your specific needs.

learningGoals.title: AI Limitations
learningGoals.hint: Learn about the fundamental limitations of current AI systems and where they fall short.

learningGoals.title: Prompt Engineering
learningGoals.hint: Master the art of writing prompts that get better, more reliable results from AI models.

learningGoals.title: Fact-Checking AI
learningGoals.hint: Learn strategies and techniques for verifying the accuracy of AI-generated information.

learningGoals.title: AI Bias & Fairness
learningGoals.hint: Understand how biases in training data affect AI outputs and learn to identify potentially biased responses.

learningGoals.title: Managing Long Chats
learningGoals.description: Keep AI on track in long conversations
learningGoals.hint: Learn techniques for maintaining context and quality in extended AI conversations.

learningGoals.title: Advanced Prompting
learningGoals.hint: Learn advanced prompting strategies like chain-of-thought reasoning and few-shot learning.

learningGoals.title: Ethical AI Use
learningGoals.hint: Explore ethical considerations when using AI - from attribution to avoiding harm.

learningGoals.title: AI for Coding
learningGoals.description: Use AI to help write and debug code
learningGoals.hint: Learn how to effectively use AI assistants for programming tasks - from code generation to debugging.

learningGoals.title: AI for Writing
learningGoals.description: Enhance your writing with AI assistance
learningGoals.hint: Discover how to use AI as a writing partner - for brainstorming, editing, and improving your text.
